v.name: Audio_Event_RegionOccupied
v.comment: This happens when the player takes possession of one of the objective areas, this is a positive outcome. They are moving forward and making progress. Should be a positive shift in tone.

v.name: Audio_Event_EscortUnitLost
v.comment: Played when an escort unit is destroyed. This is a bad outcome. Player is meant to ensure the survival of theses units.

v.name: Audio_Event_EnemyReinforcement
v.comment: Plays when the enemy forces are boosted by reinforcements. Bad outcome. Should be ominous/negative.

v.name: Audio_Event_EscapeZoneReached
v.comment: Plays when the player has reached an area in order to escape/extract friendly units.

v.name: Audio_Event_FriendlyReinforcement
v.comment: When the player is bolstered by friendly reinforcements.

v.name: Audio_Event_DefendTargetDestroyed
v.comment: Plays when a friendly target the player is tasked with defending is destroyed. This is a bit more generic, and the target may not be a human/personnel target, could be a building.

v.name: Audio_Event_EnemyLanceDestroyed
v.comment: Plays when you eliminate an entire enemy lance. This is typically associated with an objective when it fires.

v.name: Audio_Event_EnemyTargetDestroyed
v.comment: Plays when the player is able to destroy a target (mech, vehicle, building), that is a target for an objective. More generic. A positive outcome, progress towards completion.

v.name: Audio_Event_TimerAdvance
v.comment: Plays when a timer advances for objective. It is neutral, not positive or negative.

v.name: Audio_Event_TimerCompletes
v.comment: Plays when a timer is finished or completed for objective. It is neutral, not positive or negative.

v.name: Audio_Event_EscapeActivated
v.comment: When the players escape area is active and now they have to flee to it.

v.name: Audio_Event_TargetFleeing
v.comment: Plays when target is attempting to flee the players units. Clinging on to life.
